title: The Booby prize
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Christopher Myline and Bryan Nelson
brief_description: Christmas Island is immensely rich in phosphate fertilizer, and is one of the finest seabird islands in the world. Phosphate mining is destroying the habitat of the seabirds, and endangering the survival of such rare species as “Abbott’s Boobies”.
creator_credit_for_label: British Broadcasting Corporation, Christopher Myline and Bryan Nelson
